original_title: SLT-MOBITEL brings seasonal abundance with RELOAD වාසි පිට වාසි!
original_body_lines: Brining excitement and joy to Sri Lankans during the Avurudu season, SLT-MOBITEL is cheering the festive spirit with RELOAD වාසි පිට වාසි, by providing an opportunity for 300 SLT-MOBITEL Mobile pre-paid customers to win 3 million rupees during the month of April.

SLT-MOBITEL understands that April is a seasonal month with added expenses, and as such the RELOAD වාසි පිට වාසි promo aims to help customers celebrate the season better by winning daily cash prizes to fulfil their aspirations. Customers can enrol in the draw from April 1st to April 30th by simply reloading Rs.100 or more to their pre-Paid connection. SLT-MOBITEL Mobile will select 10 prepaid customers daily and will reward a cash prize of Rs 10,000.

For every Rs. 100 reload, customers will receive 1 winning chance. Thus, the more customers reload their connection, the more winning chances they receive.By dialling #151# customer can simply check their daily winning chances at any given moment. Winners are randomly selected and will be contacted officially by SLT-MOBITEL to inform them and verify their details. For more information, please visit https://www.mobitel.lk/reload-wasi
